sen.j: 伏見宮治仁王（ふしみのみやはるひとおう 建徳元年/応安3年（1370年） - 応永24年2月12日 （1417年2月28日））は、南北朝時代、室町時代の日本の皇族。
sen.e: Fushiminomiya Prince Haruhito (1370 - February 28, 1417) was Japanese Imperial family member during the period of the Northern and Southern Dynastiesand the Muromachi period.
Fushiminomiya Prince Haruhito (1370 - February 28, 1417) was A Japanese Imperial family member during the period of the Northern and Southern Courtand the Muromachi period.
Prince Fushiminomiya Haruhito (1370 - February 28, 1417) was a Japanese Imperial family member during the period of the Northern and Southern Court and the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: 表記訂正しました。a小文字にしました。改行削除。

sen.j: 世襲親王家の一つ、伏見宮第2代当主。
sen.e: He was the family head of second Fushiminomiya family, which was one of the heredity Imperial family.
He was the family head of the second Fushiminomiya family, which was one of the heredity Imperial families.
He was the family head of the second Fushiminomiya family, which was one of the heredity Imperial families.

sen.j: 父は伏見宮栄仁親王、母は三条実治の娘、藤原治子（西御方）。
sen.e: His father was Fushiminomiya Imperial Prince Yoshihito, and his mother was Saneharu SANJO's daughter, FUJIWARA no Haruko. (Nishi no Onkata)
His father was Fushiminomiya Imperial Prince Yoshihito, and his mother was Saneharu SANJO's daughter, FUJIWARA no Haruko. (Nishi no Onkata)
His father was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Yoshihito, and his mother was Saneharu SANJO's daughter, FUJIWARA no Haruko (Nishi no Onkata).
sen.cmt: 表記訂正しました。括弧位置訂正。

sen.j: 伏見宮第3代当主の伏見宮貞成親王は兄弟。
sen.e: His brother was Fushiminomiya Imperial Prince Sadafusa, the third family head of the Fushiminomiya family.
His brother was Fushiminomiya Imperial Prince Sadafusa, the third family head of the Fushiminomiya family.
His brother was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadafusa, the third family head of the Fushiminomiya family.

sen.j: 崇光天皇は祖父にあたる。
sen.e: His grandfather was Emperor Suko.
His grandfather was Emperor Suko.
His grandfather was Emperor Suko.
He had coming-of-age ceremony in 1408.
He had coming-of-age ceremony in 1408.
He had coming-of-age ceremony in 1408.

sen.j: 応永23年（1416年）11月に父栄仁親王が薨去すると宮家を相続するが、わずか数ヶ月で急逝した。
sen.e: After his father, Imperial Prince Yoshihito died in November 1416, he succeeded to the Miyake however, he died after a few months.
After his father, Imperial Prince Yoshihito died in November 1416, he succeeded to Miyake (families allowed to be in status of Imperial family) however, he died after a few months.
After his father, Imperial Prince Yoshihito died in November 1416, he succeeded to Miyake (house of an imperial prince) however, he died after a few months.
sen.cmt: "Miyake (families allowed to be in status of Imperial family)" -> "Miyake (house of an imperial prince)" に変更しました。

sen.j: このため治仁王の跡を継いだ貞成王に兄を毒殺した嫌疑がかけられたが、後小松上皇や4代将軍足利義持への弁明が功を奏して安堵を受けている。
sen.e: The Prince Sadafusa who succeeded to his older brother, Prince Haruhito, was under the suspicion of killing his brother with poison, but he was relieved since the retired Emperor Gokomatsu and the fourth Shogun Yoshimochi ASHIKAGA did favor and made explanations for Prince Sadafusa.

The Prince Sadafusa who succeeded to his older brother, Prince Haruhito, was under the suspicion of killing his brother with poison, but he was released since the retired Emperor Gokomatsu and the fourth Shogun Yoshimochi ASHIKAGA did a favor and made an alibi for Prince Sadafusa.

Prince Sadafusa who succeeded to his older brother, Prince Haruhito, was under the suspicion of killing his brother with poison, but he was released since the Retired Emperor Gokomatsu and the fourth Shogun Yoshimochi ASHIKAGA did a favor and made an alibi for Prince Sadafusa.
sen.cmt: The削除。Retired大文字にしました。

sen.j: なお、治仁王は貞成親王の兄であるというのが通説であるが、それは享年の書き誤りであって貞成親王の弟とする説もある。
sen.e: There is a common theory that Prince Haruhito was Imperial Prince Yoshihito's older brother, however there is another theory that it was recorded by mistake, and Prince Haruhito was Imperial Prince Sadafusa's younger brother.

There is a common theory that Prince Haruhito was Imperial Prince Yoshihito's older brother, however there is another theory that it was recorded by mistake, and Prince Haruhito was Imperial Prince Sadafusa's younger brother.

There is a common theory that Prince Haruhito was Imperial Prince Yoshihito's older brother, however there is another theory that it was recorded by mistake, and Prince Haruhito was Imperial Prince Sadafusa's younger brother.
